properties.areaDesc: Waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL from 20 to 60 NM excluding the territorial waters of Bahamas
properties.headline: Special Marine Warning issued January 29 at 11:44PM EST until January 30 at 12:30AM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a

* Special Marine Warning for...
Waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL from 20 to 60 NM
excluding the territorial waters of Bahamas...

* Until 1230 AM EST.

* At 1144 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing
waterspouts was located 41 nm east of Pacific Reef, moving
northeast at 40 knots.

HAZARD...Waterspouts and wind gusts 34 knots or greater.

SOURCE...Radar.

IMPACT...Waterspouts can easily overturn boats and create locally
hazardous seas. Small craft could be damaged in briefly
higher winds and suddenly higher waves.

* The severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly open waters.
properties.instruction:
Move to safe harbor until hazardous weather passes.

Move to safe harbor immediately as gusty winds and high waves are
expected.

Thunderstorms can produce sudden waterspouts. Waterspouts can easily
overturn boats and create locally hazardous seas. Seek safe harbor
immediately.

Report severe weather to the Coast Guard or the National Weather
Service. You can also share your report with NWS Miami on Facebook
and Twitter.
